inclusion.criterion: Patients with any form of spinal fusion surgery performed by Dr. Daniel Fassett, MD, MBA, Neurosurgeon at OSF-INI from November 1, 2012 to October 31, 2014.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum Vitamin D level checked prior to or at surgery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: BMD exam performed anytime within 2 years prior to surgery
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with any form of spinal fusion cervical, thoracic, lumbar, surgery performed by Dr. Daniel Fassett, MD, MBA, Neurosurgeon at OSF-INI from July 1, 2015 to May 31, 2016.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Chronic Renal Disease with a GFR < 45 at Stage IV
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Chronic steroid use greater than 3 months at time of surgery
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects diagnosed with chronic renal disease Stage IV or V, metastatic spinal disease, bariatric surgery, malabsorption syndrome, seizure medication and chronic steroid use greater than 3 months at time of surgery.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 34-year-old woman from Jordan with general and non-specific bones and joints pain. Her past medical and drug history are unremarkable.
